panels.description:
QPS计算只包括客户端发送到服务器的语句，而不包括存储程序中执行的语句
- 以下命令不被统计：
* ``COM_PING``
* ``COM_STATISTICS``
* ``COM_STMT_PREPARE``
* ``COM_STMT_CLOSE``
* ``COM_STMT_RESET``
panels.title: QPS/TPS

panels.description:
**InnoDB Row Operations**

This graph allows you to see which operations occur and the number of rows affected per operation. A graph like Queries Per Second will give you an idea of queries, but one query could effect millions of rows.
panels.title: InnoDB Row Operations

list.description: IP address of this postgres instance
list.label: IP
list.name: ip

list.description: Sequence number of this instance, which is an unique integer among a postgres cluster
list.label: Sequence
list.name: seq

list.description: Cluster identifier for this postgres instance, cls should be unique among entire environment. such as pg-meta, pg-test
list.label: Cluster
list.name: cls

list.description: Node name of current postgres instance
list.label: Node
list.name: node
